00083 static orxINLINE orxU32                 orxString_ContinueCRC(const orxSTRING _zString, orxU32 _u32CRC)
00084 {
00085   orxU32          u32CRC;
00086   const orxCHAR  *pc;
00087 
00088   /* Checks */
00089   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00090 
00091   /* Inits CRC */
00092   u32CRC = _u32CRC ^ 0xFFFFFFFFL;
00093 
00094   /* For the whole string */
00095   for(pc = _zString; *pc != orxCHAR_NULL; pc++)
00096   {
00097     /* Computes the CRC */
00098     u32CRC = sau32CRCTable[(u32CRC ^ *pc) & 0xFF] ^ (u32CRC >> 8);
00099   }
00100 
00101   /* Done! */
00102   return(u32CRC ^ 0xFFFFFFFFL);
00103 }
00104 
00111 static orxINLINE orxU32                 orxString_NContinueCRC(const orxSTRING _zString, orxU32 _u32CRC, orxU32 _u32CharNumber)
00112 {
00113   orxU32          u32CRC;
00114   orxU32          u32Counter;
00115   const orxCHAR  *pc;
00116 
00117   /* Checks */
00118   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00119 
00120   /* Inits CRC */
00121   u32CRC = _u32CRC ^ 0xFFFFFFFFL;
00122 
00123   /* For the whole string */
00124   for(pc = _zString, u32Counter = 0; (*pc != orxCHAR_NULL) && (u32Counter < _u32CharNumber); pc++, u32Counter++)
00125   {
00126     /* Computes the CRC */
00127     u32CRC = sau32CRCTable[(u32CRC ^ *pc) & 0xFF] ^ (u32CRC >> 8);
00128   }
00129 
00130   /* Done! */
00131   return(u32CRC ^ 0xFFFFFFFFL);
00132 }

00138 static orxINLINE const orxSTRING        orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(const orxSTRING _zString)
00139 {
00140   const orxSTRING zResult;
00141 
00142   /* Non null? */
00143   if(_zString != orxNULL)
00144   {
00145     /* Skips all white spaces */
00146     for(zResult = _zString; (*zResult == ' ') || (*zResult == '\t'); zResult++);
00147 
00148     /* Empty? */
00149     if(*zResult == orxCHAR_NULL)
00150     {
00151       /* Updates result */
00152       zResult = orxSTRING_EMPTY;
00153     }
00154   }
00155   else
00156   {
00157     /* Updates result */
00158     zResult = orxNULL;
00159   }
00160 
00161   /* Done! */
00162   return zResult;
00163 }
00164 
00169 static orxINLINE const orxSTRING        orxString_SkipPath(const orxSTRING _zString)
00170 {
00171   const orxSTRING zResult;
00172 
00173   /* Non null? */
00174   if(_zString != orxNULL)
00175   {
00176     const orxCHAR *pc;
00177 
00178     /* Updates result */
00179     zResult = _zString;
00180 
00181     /* For all characters */
00182     for(pc = _zString; *pc != orxCHAR_NULL; pc++)
00183     {
00184       /* Is a directory separator? */
00185       if((*pc == orxCHAR_DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR_LINUX) || (*pc == orxCHAR_DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR_WINDOWS))
00186       {
00187         orxCHAR cNextChar = *(pc + 1);
00188 
00189         /* Non terminal and not a directory separator? */
00190         if((cNextChar != orxCHAR_NULL) && (cNextChar != orxCHAR_DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR_LINUX) && (cNextChar != orxCHAR_DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR_WINDOWS))
00191         {
00192           /* Updates result */
00193           zResult = pc + 1;
00194         }
00195       }
00196     }
00197   }
00198   else
00199   {
00200     /* Updates result */
00201     zResult = orxNULL;
00202   }
00203 
00204   /* Done! */
00205   return zResult;
00206 }

00213 {
00214   /* Checks */
00215   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00216 
00217   /* Done! */
00218   return((orxU32)strlen(_zString));

00225 static orxINLINE orxBOOL                orxString_IsCharacterASCII(orxU32 _u32CharacterCodePoint)
00226 {
00227   return((_u32CharacterCodePoint < 0x80) ? orxTRUE : orxFALSE);
00228 }
00229 
00234 static orxINLINE orxBOOL                orxString_GetUTF8CharacterLength(orxU32 _u32CharacterCodePoint)
00235 {
00236   orxU32 u32Result;
00237 
00238   /* 1-byte long? */
00239   if(_u32CharacterCodePoint < 0x80)
00240   {
00241     /* Updates result */
00242     u32Result = 1;
00243   }
00244   else if(_u32CharacterCodePoint < 0x0800)
00245   {
00246     /* Updates result */
00247     u32Result = 2;
00248   }
00249   else if(_u32CharacterCodePoint < 0x00010000)
00250   {
00251     /* Updates result */
00252     u32Result = 3;
00253   }
00254   else if(_u32CharacterCodePoint < 0x00110000)
00255   {
00256     /* Updates result */
00257     u32Result = 4;
00258   }
00259   else
00260   {
00261     /* Updates result */
00262     u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00263   }
00264 
00265   /* Done! */
00266   return u32Result;
00267 }
00268 
00275 static orxU32 orxFASTCALL               orxString_PrintUTF8Character(orxSTRING _zDstString, orxU32 _u32Size, orxU32 _u32CharacterCodePoint)
00276 {
00277   orxU32 u32Result;
00278 
00279   /* Gets character's encoded length */
00280   u32Result = orxString_GetUTF8CharacterLength(_u32CharacterCodePoint);
00281 
00282   /* Enough room? */
00283   if(u32Result <= _u32Size)
00284   {
00285     /* Depending on character's length */
00286     switch(u32Result)
00287     {
00288       case 1:
00289       {
00290         /* Writes character */
00291         *_zDstString = (orxCHAR)_u32CharacterCodePoint;
00292 
00293         break;
00294       }
00295 
00296       case 2:
00297       {
00298         /* Writes first character */
00299         *_zDstString++ = (orxCHAR)(0xC0 | ((_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x07C0) >> 6));
00300 
00301         /* Writes second character */
00302         *_zDstString = (orxCHAR)(0x80 | (_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x3F));
00303 
00304         break;
00305       }
00306 
00307       case 3:
00308       {
00309         /* Writes first character */
00310         *_zDstString++ = (orxCHAR)(0xE0 | ((_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0xF000) >> 12));
00311 
00312         /* Writes second character */
00313         *_zDstString++ = (orxCHAR)(0x80 | ((_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x0FC0) >> 6));
00314 
00315         /* Writes third character */
00316         *_zDstString = (orxCHAR)(0x80 | (_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x3F));
00317 
00318         break;
00319       }
00320 
00321       case 4:
00322       {
00323         /* Writes first character */
00324         *_zDstString++ = (orxCHAR)(0xF0 | ((_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x001C0000) >> 18));
00325 
00326         /* Writes second character */
00327         *_zDstString++ = (orxCHAR)(0x80 | ((_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x0003F000) >> 12));
00328 
00329         /* Writes third character */
00330         *_zDstString++ = (orxCHAR)(0x80 | ((_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x00000FC0) >> 6));
00331 
00332         /* Writes fourth character */
00333         *_zDstString = (orxCHAR)(0x80 | (_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x3F));
00334 
00335         break;
00336       }
00337 
00338       default:
00339       {
00340         /* Logs message */
00341         orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Can't print invalid unicode character <0x%X> to string.", _u32CharacterCodePoint);
00342 
00343         /* Updates result */
00344         u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00345 
00346         break;
00347       }
00348     }
00349   }
00350   else
00351   {
00352     /* Logs message */
00353     orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Can't print unicode character <0x%X> to string as there isn't enough space for it.", _u32CharacterCodePoint);
00354 
00355     /* Updates result */
00356     u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00357   }
00358 
00359   /* Done! */
00360   return u32Result;
00361 }
00362 
00368 static orxU32 orxFASTCALL               orxString_GetFirstCharacterCodePoint(const orxSTRING _zString, const orxSTRING *_pzRemaining)
00369 {
00370   orxU8  *pu8Byte;
00371   orxU32  u32Result;
00372 
00373   /* Checks */
00374   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00375 
00376   /* Gets the first byte */
00377   pu8Byte = (orxU8 *)_zString;
00378 
00379   /* ASCII? */
00380   if(*pu8Byte < 0x80)
00381   {
00382     /* Updates result */
00383     u32Result = *pu8Byte;
00384   }
00385   /* Invalid UTF-8 byte sequence */
00386   else if(*pu8Byte < 0xC0)
00387   {
00388     /* Logs message */
00389     orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: multi-byte sequence non-leading byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00390 
00391     /* Updates result */
00392     u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00393   }
00394   /* Overlong UTF-8 2-byte sequence */
00395   else if(*pu8Byte < 0xC2)
00396   {
00397     /* Logs message */
00398     orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: overlong 2-byte sequence starting with byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00399 
00400     /* Updates result */
00401     u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00402   }
00403   /* 2-byte sequence */
00404   else if(*pu8Byte < 0xE0)
00405   {
00406     /* Updates result with first character */
00407     u32Result = *pu8Byte++ & 0x1F;
00408 
00409     /* Valid second character? */
00410     if((*pu8Byte & 0xC0) == 0x80)
00411     {
00412       /* Updates result */
00413       u32Result = (u32Result << 6) | (*pu8Byte & 0x3F);
00414     }
00415     else
00416     {
00417       /* Logs message */
00418       orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: 2-byte sequence non-trailing byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00419 
00420       /* Updates result */
00421       u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00422     }
00423   }
00424   /* 3-byte sequence */
00425   else if(*pu8Byte < 0xF0)
00426   {
00427     /* Updates result with first character */
00428     u32Result = *pu8Byte++ & 0x0F;
00429 
00430     /* Valid second character? */
00431     if((*pu8Byte & 0xC0) == 0x80)
00432     {
00433       /* Updates result */
00434       u32Result = (u32Result << 6) | (*pu8Byte++ & 0x3F);
00435 
00436       /* Valid third character? */
00437       if((*pu8Byte & 0xC0) == 0x80)
00438       {
00439         /* Updates result */
00440         u32Result = (u32Result << 6) | (*pu8Byte & 0x3F);
00441       }
00442       else
00443       {
00444         /* Logs message */
00445         orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: 3-byte sequence non-trailing byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00446 
00447         /* Updates result */
00448         u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00449       }
00450     }
00451     else
00452     {
00453       /* Logs message */
00454       orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: 3-byte sequence non-trailing byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00455 
00456       /* Updates result */
00457       u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00458     }
00459   }
00460   /* 4-byte sequence */
00461   else if(*pu8Byte < 0xF5)
00462   {
00463     /* Updates result with first character */
00464     u32Result = *pu8Byte++ & 0x07;
00465 
00466     /* Valid second character? */
00467     if((*pu8Byte & 0xC0) == 0x80)
00468     {
00469       /* Updates result */
00470       u32Result = (u32Result << 6) | (*pu8Byte++ & 0x3F);
00471 
00472       /* Valid third character? */
00473       if((*pu8Byte & 0xC0) == 0x80)
00474       {
00475         /* Updates result */
00476         u32Result = (u32Result << 6) | (*pu8Byte++ & 0x3F);
00477 
00478         /* Valid fourth character? */
00479         if((*pu8Byte & 0xC0) == 0x80)
00480         {
00481           /* Updates result */
00482           u32Result = (u32Result << 6) | (*pu8Byte & 0x3F);
00483         }
00484         else
00485         {
00486           /* Logs message */
00487           orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: 4-byte sequence non-trailing byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00488 
00489           /* Updates result */
00490           u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00491         }
00492       }
00493       else
00494       {
00495         /* Logs message */
00496         orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: 4-byte sequence non-trailing byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00497 
00498         /* Updates result */
00499         u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00500       }
00501     }
00502     else
00503     {
00504       /* Logs message */
00505       orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: 4-byte sequence non-trailing byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00506 
00507       /* Updates result */
00508       u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00509     }
00510   }
00511   else
00512   {
00513     /* Logs message */
00514     orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: invalid out-of-bound byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00515 
00516     /* Updates result */
00517     u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00518   }
00519 
00520   /* Asks for remaining string? */
00521   if(_pzRemaining != orxNULL)
00522   {
00523     /* Stores it */
00524     *_pzRemaining = (orxSTRING)(pu8Byte + 1);
00525   }
00526 
00527   /* Done! */
00528   return u32Result;
00529 }
00530 
00535 static orxINLINE orxU32                 orxString_GetCharacterCounter(const orxSTRING _zString)
00536 {
00537   const orxCHAR  *pc;
00538   orxU32          u32Result;
00539 
00540   /* Checks */
00541   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00542 
00543   /* For all characters */
00544   for(pc = _zString, u32Result = 0; *pc != orxCHAR_NULL; u32Result++)
00545   {
00546     /* Invalid current character ID */
00547     if(orxString_GetFirstCharacterCodePoint(pc, &pc) == orxU32_UNDEFINED)
00548     {
00549       /* Updates result */
00550       u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00551 
00552       /* Logs message */
00553       orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF8 string <%s>, can't count characters.", _zString);
00554 
00555       break;
00556     }
00557   }
00558 
00559   /* Done! */
00560   return u32Result;
00561 }

00569 static orxINLINE orxSTRING              orxString_NCopy(orxSTRING _zDstString, const orxSTRING _zSrcString, orxU32 _u32CharNumber)
00570 {
00571   /* Checks */
00572   orxASSERT(_zDstString != orxNULL);
00573   orxASSERT(_zSrcString != orxNULL);
00574 
00575   /* Done! */
00576   return(strncpy(_zDstString, _zSrcString, _u32CharNumber));

00598 static orxINLINE orxSTRING              orxString_Duplicate(const orxSTRING _zSrcString)
00599 {
00600   orxSTRING zResult;
00601 
00602   /* Checks */

00604 
00605   /* Updates result */

00607 
00608   /* Done! */
00609   return zResult;

00615 static orxINLINE orxSTATUS              orxString_Delete(orxSTRING _zString)
00616 {
00617   /* Checks */
00618   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00619   orxASSERT(_zString != orxSTRING_EMPTY);
00620 
00621   /* Frees its memory */
00622   free(_zString);
00623 
00624   /* Done! */
00625   return orxSTATUS_SUCCESS;

00668 static orxINLINE orxS32                 orxString_ICompare(const orxSTRING _zString1, const orxSTRING _zString2)
00669 {
00670   /* Checks */
00671   orxASSERT(_zString1 != orxNULL);
00672   orxASSERT(_zString2 != orxNULL);
00673 
00674 #ifdef __orxWINDOWS__
00675 
00676   /* Done! */
00677   return(stricmp(_zString1, _zString2));
00678 
00679 #else /* __orxWINDOWS__ */
00680 
00681   /* Done! */
00682   return strcasecmp(_zString1, _zString2);
00683 
00684 #endif /* __orxWINDOWS__ */
00685 }
00686 
00695 static orxINLINE orxS32                 orxString_NICompare(const orxSTRING _zString1, const orxSTRING _zString2, orxU32 _u32CharNumber)
00696 {
00697   /* Checks */
00698   orxASSERT(_zString1 != orxNULL);
00699   orxASSERT(_zString2 != orxNULL);
00700 
00701 #ifdef __orxWINDOWS__
00702 
00703   /* Done! */
00704   return strnicmp(_zString1, _zString2, _u32CharNumber);
00705 
00706 #else /* __orxWINDOWS__ */
00707 
00708   /* Done! */
00709   return strncasecmp(_zString1, _zString2, _u32CharNumber);
00710 
00711 #endif /* __orxWINDOWS__ */
00712 }

00721 static orxINLINE orxSTATUS              orxString_ToS32Base(const orxSTRING _zString, orxU32 _u32Base, orxS32 *_ps32OutValue, const orxSTRING *_pzRemaining)
00722 {
00723   orxCHAR    *pcEnd;
00724   orxSTATUS   eResult;
00725 
00726   /* Checks */
00727   orxASSERT(_ps32OutValue != orxNULL);
00728   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00729 
00730   /* Convert */
00731   *_ps32OutValue = strtol(_zString, &pcEnd, _u32Base);
00732   
00733   /* Valid conversion ? */
00734   if((pcEnd != _zString) && (_zString[0] != orxCHAR_NULL))
00735   {
00736     /* Updates result */
00737     eResult = orxSTATUS_SUCCESS;
00738   }
00739   else
00740   {
00741     /* Updates result */
00742     eResult = orxSTATUS_FAILURE;
00743   }
00744 
00745   /* Asks for remaining string? */
00746   if(_pzRemaining != orxNULL)
00747   {
00748     /* Stores it */
00749     *_pzRemaining = pcEnd;
00750   }
00751 
00752   /* Done! */
00753   return eResult;
00754 }
00755 
00762 static orxINLINE orxSTATUS              orxString_ToS32(const orxSTRING _zString, orxS32 *_ps32OutValue, const orxSTRING *_pzRemaining)
00763 {
00764   orxSTATUS eResult;
00765 
00766   /* Checks */
00767   orxASSERT(_ps32OutValue != orxNULL);
00768   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00769 
00770   /* Hexadecimal? */
00771   if((_zString[0] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00772   && (_zString[0] == '0')
00773   && (_zString[1] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00774   && ((_zString[1] | 0x20) == 'x'))
00775   {
00776     /* Gets hexa value */
00777     eResult = orxString_ToS32Base(_zString + 2, 16, _ps32OutValue, _pzRemaining);
00778   }
00779   /* Binary? */
00780   else if((_zString[0] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00781        && (_zString[0] == '0')
00782        && (_zString[1] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00783        && ((_zString[1] | 0x20) == 'b'))
00784   {
00785     /* Gets binary value */
00786     eResult = orxString_ToS32Base(_zString + 2, 2, _ps32OutValue, _pzRemaining);
00787   }
00788   /* Octal? */
00789   else if((_zString[0] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00790   && ((_zString[0] | 0x20) == '0'))
00791   {
00792     /* Gets octal value */
00793     eResult = orxString_ToS32Base(_zString + 1, 8, _ps32OutValue, _pzRemaining);
00794   }
00795   /* Decimal */
00796   else
00797   {
00798     /* Gets decimal value */
00799     eResult = orxString_ToS32Base(_zString, 10, _ps32OutValue, _pzRemaining);
00800   }
00801 
00802   /* Done! */
00803   return eResult;
00804 }
00805 
00813 static orxINLINE orxSTATUS              orxString_ToU32Base(const orxSTRING _zString, orxU32 _u32Base, orxU32 *_pu32OutValue, const orxSTRING *_pzRemaining)
00814 {
00815   orxCHAR    *pcEnd;
00816   orxSTATUS   eResult;
00817 
00818   /* Checks */
00819   orxASSERT(_pu32OutValue != orxNULL);
00820   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00821 
00822   /* Convert */
00823   *_pu32OutValue = strtoul(_zString, &pcEnd, _u32Base);
00824   
00825   /* Valid conversion ? */
00826   if((pcEnd != _zString) && (_zString[0] != orxCHAR_NULL))
00827   {
00828     /* Updates result */
00829     eResult = orxSTATUS_SUCCESS;
00830   }
00831   else
00832   {
00833     /* Updates result */
00834     eResult = orxSTATUS_FAILURE;
00835   }
00836 
00837   /* Asks for remaining string? */
00838   if(_pzRemaining != orxNULL)
00839   {
00840     /* Stores it */
00841     *_pzRemaining = pcEnd;
00842   }
00843 
00844   /* Done! */
00845   return eResult;
00846 }
00847 
00854 static orxINLINE orxSTATUS              orxString_ToU32(const orxSTRING _zString, orxU32 *_pu32OutValue, const orxSTRING *_pzRemaining)
00855 {
00856   orxSTATUS eResult;
00857 
00858   /* Checks */
00859   orxASSERT(_pu32OutValue != orxNULL);
00860   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00861 
00862   /* Hexadecimal? */
00863   if((_zString[0] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00864   && (_zString[0] == '0')
00865   && (_zString[1] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00866   && ((_zString[1] | 0x20) == 'x'))
00867   {
00868     /* Gets hexa value */
00869     eResult = orxString_ToU32Base(_zString + 2, 16, _pu32OutValue, _pzRemaining);
00870   }
00871   /* Binary? */
00872   else if((_zString[0] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00873        && (_zString[0] == '0')
00874        && (_zString[1] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00875        && ((_zString[1] | 0x20) == 'b'))
00876   {
00877     /* Gets binary value */
00878     eResult = orxString_ToU32Base(_zString + 2, 2, _pu32OutValue, _pzRemaining);
00879   }
00880   /* Octal? */
00881   else if((_zString[0] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00882   && ((_zString[0] | 0x20) == '0'))
00883   {
00884     /* Gets octal value */
00885     eResult = orxString_ToU32Base(_zString + 1, 8, _pu32OutValue, _pzRemaining);
00886   }
00887   /* Decimal */
00888   else
00889   {
00890     /* Gets decimal value */
00891     eResult = orxString_ToU32Base(_zString, 10, _pu32OutValue, _pzRemaining);
00892   }
00893 
00894   /* Done! */
00895   return eResult;
00896 }

00904 static orxINLINE orxSTATUS              orxString_ToFloat(const orxSTRING _zString, orxFLOAT *_pfOutValue, const orxSTRING *_pzRemaining)
00905 {
00906   orxCHAR    *pcEnd;
00907   orxSTATUS   eResult;
00908 
00909   /* Checks */
00910   orxASSERT(_pfOutValue != orxNULL);
00911   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00912 
00913   /* Linux / Mac / GP2X / Wii / IPhone / Android / MSVC? */
00914 #if defined(__orxLINUX__) || defined(__orxMAC__) || defined(__orxGP2X__) || defined(__orxWII__) || defined (__orxIPHONE__) || defined(__orxMSVC__) || defined(__orxANDROID__)
00915 
00916   /* Converts it */
00917   *_pfOutValue = (orxFLOAT)strtod(_zString, &pcEnd);
00918 
00919 #else /* __orxLINUX__ || __orxMAC__ || __orxGP2X__ || __orxWII__ || __orxIPHONE__ || __orxMSVC__ || __orxANDROID__ */
00920 
00921   /* Converts it */
00922   *_pfOutValue = strtof(_zString, &pcEnd);
00923 
00924 #endif /* __orxLINUX__ || __orxMAC__ || __orxGP2X__ || __orxWII__ || __orxIPHONE__ || __orxMSVC__ || __orxANDROID__ */
00925 
00926   /* Valid conversion ? */
00927   if((pcEnd != _zString) && (_zString[0] != orxCHAR_NULL))
00928   {
00929     /* Updates result */
00930     eResult = orxSTATUS_SUCCESS;
00931   }
00932   else
00933   {
00934     /* Updates result */
00935     eResult = orxSTATUS_FAILURE;
00936   }
00937 
00938   /* Asks for remaining string? */
00939   if(_pzRemaining != orxNULL)
00940   {
00941     /* Stores it */
00942     *_pzRemaining = pcEnd;
00943   }
00944 
00945   /* Done! */
00946   return eResult;
00947 }

00955 static orxINLINE orxSTATUS              orxString_ToVector(const orxSTRING _zString, orxVECTOR *_pvOutValue, const orxSTRING *_pzRemaining)
00956 {
00957   orxVECTOR       stValue;
00958   const orxSTRING zString;
00959   orxSTATUS       eResult = orxSTATUS_FAILURE;
00960 
00961   /* Checks */
00962   orxASSERT(_pvOutValue != orxNULL);
00963   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00964 
00965   /* Skips all white spaces */
00966   zString = orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(_zString);
00967 
00968   /* Is a vector start character? */
00969   if((*zString == orxSTRING_KC_VECTOR_START)
00970   || (*zString == orxSTRING_KC_VECTOR_START_ALT))
00971   {
00972     /* Skips all white spaces */
00973     zString = orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(zString + 1);
00974 
00975     /* Gets X value */
00976     eResult = orxString_ToFloat(zString, &(stValue.fX), &zString);
00977 
00978     /* Success? */
00979     if(eResult != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00980     {
00981       /* Skips all white spaces */
00982       zString = orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(zString);
00983 
00984       /* Is a vector separator character? */
00985       if(*zString == orxSTRING_KC_VECTOR_SEPARATOR)
00986       {
00987         /* Skips all white spaces */
00988         zString = orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(zString + 1);
00989 
00990         /* Gets Y value */
00991         eResult = orxString_ToFloat(zString, &(stValue.fY), &zString);
00992 
00993         /* Success? */
00994         if(eResult != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00995         {
00996           /* Skips all white spaces */
00997           zString = orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(zString);
00998 
00999           /* Is a vector separator character? */
01000           if(*zString == orxSTRING_KC_VECTOR_SEPARATOR)
01001           {
01002             /* Skips all white spaces */
01003             zString = orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(zString + 1);
01004 
01005             /* Gets Z value */
01006             eResult = orxString_ToFloat(zString, &(stValue.fZ), &zString);
01007 
01008             /* Success? */
01009             if(eResult != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
01010             {
01011               /* Skips all white spaces */
01012               zString = orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(zString);
01013 
01014               /* Is not a vector end character? */
01015               if((*zString != orxSTRING_KC_VECTOR_END)
01016               && (*zString != orxSTRING_KC_VECTOR_END_ALT))
01017               {
01018                 /* Updates result */
01019                 eResult = orxSTATUS_FAILURE;
01020               }
01021             }
01022           }
01023         }
01024       }
01025     }
01026   }
01027 
01028   /* Valid? */
01029   if(eResult != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
01030   {
01031     /* Updates vector */
01032     orxVector_Copy(_pvOutValue, &stValue);
01033 
01034     /* Asks for remaining string? */
01035     if(_pzRemaining != orxNULL)
01036     {
01037       /* Stores it */
01038       *_pzRemaining = zString + 1;
01039     }
01040   }
01041 
01042   /* Done! */
01043   return eResult;
01044 }

01052 static orxINLINE orxSTATUS              orxString_ToBool(const orxSTRING _zString, orxBOOL *_pbOutValue, const orxSTRING *_pzRemaining)
01053 {
01054   orxS32    s32Value;
01055   orxSTATUS eResult;
01056 
01057   /* Checks */
01058   orxASSERT(_pbOutValue != orxNULL);
01059   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
01060 
01061   /* Tries numeric value */
01062   eResult = orxString_ToS32Base(_zString, 10, &s32Value, _pzRemaining);
01063 
01064   /* Valid? */
01065   if(eResult != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
01066   {
01067     /* Updates boolean */
01068     *_pbOutValue = (s32Value != 0) ? orxTRUE : orxFALSE;
01069   }
01070   else
01071   {
01072     orxU32 u32Length;
01073 
01074     /* Gets length of false */
01075     u32Length = orxString_GetLength(orxSTRING_FALSE);
01076 
01077     /* Is false? */
01078     if(orxString_NICompare(_zString, orxSTRING_FALSE, u32Length) == 0)
01079     {
01080       /* Updates boolean */
01081       *_pbOutValue = orxFALSE;
01082 
01083       /* Has remaining? */
01084       if(_pzRemaining != orxNULL)
01085       {
01086         /* Updates it */
01087         *_pzRemaining += u32Length;
01088       }
01089 
01090       /* Updates result */
01091       eResult = orxSTATUS_SUCCESS;
01092     }
01093     else
01094     {
01095       /* Gets length of true */
01096       u32Length = orxString_GetLength(orxSTRING_TRUE);
01097 
01098       /* Is true? */
01099       if(orxString_NICompare(_zString, orxSTRING_TRUE, u32Length) == 0)
01100       {
01101         /* Updates boolean */
01102         *_pbOutValue = orxTRUE;
01103 
01104         /* Has remaining? */
01105         if(_pzRemaining != orxNULL)
01106         {
01107           /* Updates it */
01108           *_pzRemaining += u32Length;
01109         }
01110 
01111         /* Updates result */
01112         eResult = orxSTATUS_SUCCESS;
01113       }
01114     }
01115   }
01116 
01117   /* Done! */
01118   return eResult;
01119 }

01125 static orxINLINE orxSTRING              orxString_LowerCase(orxSTRING _zString)
01126 {
01127   orxCHAR *pc;
01128 
01129   /* Checks */
01130   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
01131 
01132   /* Converts the whole string */
01133   for(pc = _zString; *pc != orxCHAR_NULL; pc++)
01134   {
01135     /* Needs to be converted? */
01136     if(*pc >= 'A' && *pc <= 'Z')
01137     {
01138       /* Lower case */
01139       *pc |= 0x20;
01140     }
01141   }
01142 
01143   return _zString;
01144 }
01145 
01150 static orxINLINE orxSTRING              orxString_UpperCase(orxSTRING _zString)
01151 {
01152   orxCHAR *pc;
01153 
01154   /* Checks */
01155   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
01156 
01157   /* Converts the whole string */
01158   for(pc = _zString; *pc != orxCHAR_NULL; pc++)
01159   {
01160     /* Needs to be converted? */
01161     if(*pc >= 'a' && *pc <= 'z')
01162     {
01163       /* Upper case */
01164       *pc &= ~0x20;
01165     }
01166   }
01167 
01168   return _zString;
01169 }

01178   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
01179 
01180   /* Computes the ID */
01181   return(orxString_ContinueCRC(_zString, 0));

01233 static orxINLINE orxS32                 orxString_SearchCharIndex(const orxSTRING _zString, orxCHAR _cChar, orxU32 _u32Position)
01234 {
01235   orxS32          s32Result = -1;
01236   orxS32          s32Index;
01237   const orxCHAR  *pc;
01238 
01239   /* Checks */
01240   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
01241   orxASSERT(_u32Position <= orxString_GetLength(_zString));
01242 
01243   /* For all characters */
01244   for(s32Index = _u32Position, pc = _zString + s32Index; *pc != orxCHAR_NULL; pc++, s32Index++)
01245   {
01246     /* Found? */
01247     if(*pc == _cChar)
01248     {
01249       /* Updates result */
01250       s32Result = s32Index;
01251 
01252       break;
01253     }
01254   }
01255 
01256   /* Done! */
01257   return s32Result;
01258 }

01265 static orxINLINE orxS32 orxCDECL        orxString_Print(orxSTRING _zDstString, const orxSTRING _zSrcString, ...)
01266 {
01267   va_list stArgs;
01268   orxS32  s32Result;
01269 
01270   /* Checks */
01271   orxASSERT(_zDstString != orxNULL);
01272   orxASSERT(_zSrcString != orxNULL);
01273 
01274   /* Gets variable arguments & print the string */
01275   va_start(stArgs, _zSrcString);
01276   s32Result = vsprintf(_zDstString, _zSrcString, stArgs);
01277   va_end(stArgs);
01278 
01279   /* Done! */
01280   return s32Result;
01281 }

01289 static orxINLINE orxS32 orxCDECL        orxString_NPrint(orxSTRING _zDstString, orxU32 _u32CharNumber, const orxSTRING _zSrcString, ...)
01290 {

01293 
01294   /* Checks */
01295   orxASSERT(_zDstString != orxNULL);
01296   orxASSERT(_zSrcString != orxNULL);
01297 
01298   /* Gets variable arguments & print the string */
01299   va_start(stArgs, _zSrcString);
01300   s32Result = vsnprintf(_zDstString, _u32CharNumber, _zSrcString, stArgs);
01301   va_end(stArgs);
01302 
01303   /* Done! */
01304   return s32Result;
01305 }
